entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is introduced as a powerful figure, with the speaker prostrating themselves before him. He is described as having 'blank, red eyes' and is shown to be surveying a group of people.

entities.name: mr goyle
entities.description: Mr. Goyle is mentioned as being in the shadow of Voldemort, suggesting that he may be present but not directly involved in the conversation.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The Death Eaters are referred to as a group of individuals who have gone missing. They are described as being in Voldemort's service, and three of them are mentioned as having died.

relationships.description: Voldemort mentions that there are six missing Death Eaters, suggesting a relationship between him and the group.
Mr. Goyle is mentioned as being in Voldemort's shadow, suggesting a power dynamic or hierarchy between the two.
